ing: 1 (15.25 ounce) can Del MonteÂ® Whole Kernel Corn, drained
1/2 cup finely chopped red bell pepper
1 medium jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
Salt and black pepper to taste (optional)
des: "This zesty 10 minute relish elevates the look and taste of everything from hot dogs to chicken to chili."
ins:
Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Toss well before serving.
Serve on grilled chicken, hot dogs, sausages, pork, fish, tacos, chili, omelets, tomato soup and more.
